title: New Possible World and Plants
description: Had this idea for like a week or two in mind, but decided to show it off right now. Not confirmed that it will be used yet.

fields.name: Hawaiian World — New World!
fields.value: World which has two parts. Half of this world like BWB with tides n' stuff, required Lily Pads. Second half takes place in a volcano and shares a lot of similarities like Lava Reef.

fields.name: Gimmick #1 — Tides
fields.value: The same gimmick from Big Wave Beach from PvZ2.

fields.name: Gimmick #2 — Low Tides
fields.value: Spawns zombies on big waves and when tide is going away.

fields.name: Gimmick #3 — Lava
fields.value: Spawns lava tiles randomly all over the lawn.
